oai_dc:dc.dc:title: San Antonio Level 1 Community Profile 2004
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NISO Committee AX, OpenURL Standard Committee
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: isReferencedBy Appendix C of the OpenURL Framework For Context-Sensitive Services Standard http://www.openurl.info/registry/docs/pdf/SanAntonioProfileLevel1-2004.pdf
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The San Antonio Level 1 Community Profile, built around the Key/Encoded-Value ContextObject Format, has choices for Metadata Formats and Namespaces that meet the needs of the scholarly information community.
